ygData.subject: Re: Warriors vs. Hybrids
ygData.msgSnippet: He s, Drew, joined this mailing list and is  keeping an eye on this board and said that he will give input where he feels he can contribute. - Az
ygData.messageBody:
He's, Drew, joined this mailing list and is keeping an eye on this board and
said that he will give input where he feels he can contribute. - Az

Mifsud, Michael wrote:

> From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>
>
> Hmm tweaked? awesome? how so?
>
> > ----------
> > From: suzkim@...[SMTP:suzkim@...]
> > Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > Sent: Tuesday, June 15, 1999 9:27 PM
> > To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Warriors vs Hybrids
> >
> > From: suzkim@...
> >
> > Hi all,
> >
> > I wrote an e-mail to one of those guys from PPI - the ones who do the
> > great
> > analysis works of classs (see eq-stratis cleric for a sampling of their
> > work). I
> > told him of the things I have been reading here such as a critical strike
> > (which
> > he didn't think would be accepted), increase what bind wound could do ( he
> > agreed that it should go up to 70-80%), increased skill cap (no comment
> > from
> > him) and unique warrior skill (again no comment from him). His idea was
> > to have
> > the warrior's defensives skill be increased some how. That would make the
> > warrior harder to hit and therefore less damage and less down time.
> >
> > I am going to try to get him to join this mailing list since I feel he
> > could
> > give great insight. He did say that they were not going to be writing
> > anything
> > soon but said something about how a warrior could be tweeked to make a
> > warrior
> > awsome.
> >
> > Azlana
> >
> >
> >
> >
> > ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> > Got an opinion?
> > http://www.onelist.com
> > Make it count! Sign up for the ONElist Weekly Survey now.
> > ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> > For the Honor and Glory of the Warlord, Rallos Zek!
> >
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------

> For the Honor and Glory of the Warlord, Rallos Zek!
